title: Dungeons & Dragons Chronicles of Mystara 1.0.2 [ONLINE]
description:
Dungeons & Dragons Chronicles of Mystara 1.0.2 (Steam/non-Steam).
----------------------------------------


Features of this Jimbus edition:
--------

  - Custom installer compressed.
  - The game is complete and updated to 1.0.2 version.
  - Audio in English and text in English, Spanish, French, Italian and German.
  - It includes a tutorial and the libraries the game requires.
  - The game can be played offline or online using Steam.



F.A.Q.:
------

Q: Do I need STEAM to play?
A: Only for online co-op/multiplayer. You can also play alone without Steam.

Q: Online CO-OP/multiplayer does not work.
A: Yes, it does. Read carefully the included guide.



Notice this is the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.


Do not say it does not work online (because it does). Read carefully the info included in the installer and the .pdf file.


Thanks to RELOADED, VOKSI, XPS2, MACHINE and the rest of the A-Team :-)
